sect2.title: Introduction to LessTif
sect2.para: The LessTif package contains an Open Source version of OSF/Motif(R).

sect2.title: Installation of LessTif
sect2.para: Install LessTif by running the following commands:

userinput.command: find -name Makefile.in | \ xargs sed -i 's@$(prefix)/LessTif@$(prefix)/share/LessTif@g' && ./configure --prefix=/usr \ --enable-build-20 \ --enable-build-21 \ --disable-debug \ --enable-production \ --disable-build-tests \ --with-xdnd && make && make install

sect2.title: Command explanations
sect2.para: sed -i 's@$(prefix)/LessTif@$(prefix)/share/LessTif@g': This moves the location of the non-FHS compliant /usr/LessTif directory to /usr/share/LessTif.
--enable-build-20: Build the Motif 2.0 compatible version of the LessTif libraries.
--enable-build-21: Also build the Motif 2.1 compatible versions.
--enable-production: Build the release version of the LessTif libraries.
--disable-build-tests: Do not build the test/ tree (see Testing LessTif).
